Module mesakit.graph.core
Package com.telenav.mesakit.graph.specifications.common.vertex.store

Class EdgeArrayStore

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.graph.specifications.common.vertex.store.EdgeArrayStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.collections.CompressibleCollection
public class EdgeArrayStore extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.collections.CompressibleCollection, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
Stores lists of edge indexes. A new list can be added under a given index with list(int, IntIterator), the list can be retrieved with list(int) and the size of the list can be determined with size(). A sequence of edges can be retrieved by index with edgeSequence(EdgeStore, int), and the number of edge lists in the store is available by calling size().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
